allParts.message: When parts are accepted in the inbox they will appear here to be considered for printing
allParts.title: No parts print ready

printReady.message: Parts that are ready to be added to a print job will appear here
printReady.title: No parts queued

sent.message: Parts will appear here when they have been assembled in a print job and sent to the printer
sent.title: No parts sent

group.tooLargeTooltip:
Group is too large to fit on any printer platform this template specifies.

Ungroup the parts or update the template to use a larger printer.

acceptPartForPrinting.acceptPartForPrinting: The part is waiting for the user to accept.
acceptPartForPrinting.partAccepted: The part has been accepted for printing.

approvePrintJob.approvePrintJob: Approve provisional jobs for sending to printers.
approvePrintJob.printJobApproved: The job has been accepted for printing.
approvePrintJob.printJobPendingApproval: The provisional job is waiting for the user to accept.

nestPrintJob.addedToPrintJob: The part has been added to a print job.
nestPrintJob.generatingSupports: Supports are being added to the provisional job before it is finalised for the user to approve for printing.
nestPrintJob.nestedInProvisionalJob:
Part has been nested in a provisional job.
It will become finalised when:

- More parts are added to fill the job, and
- A suitable printer is about to be available to print it
nestPrintJob.nestingFailed:
The nesting of parts has failed.
This could be caused by issues with the part file.
nestPrintJob.nestingPrintJob: Part is being nested in a provisional job.
nestPrintJob.nestPrintJob: The part will be nested when a suitable printer becomes available & on a “first in first out” basis.
nestPrintJob.partQueued: The part will be nested when a suitable printer becomes available & on a “first in first out” basis.
nestPrintJob.partTooLarge:
The part is too large for the printers specified in the print template.

Check the part size or consider adding a larger printer to the template.

orientatePart.orientatePart: Orientate part based on its type.
orientatePart.orientatingPart: The part is currently being orientated based on its type.
orientatePart.orientationFailed:
The part could not be orientated successfully for printing.
This could be caused by issues with the part file.
orientatePart.partOrientated: The part was orientated successfully for printing.

partIdentification.confirmPartType:
Waiting for confirmation on part type.
This determines how a part is orientated & the templates that are suggested.
partIdentification.identifyingPartType: Analysing part geometry to identify part type.
partIdentification.partIdentification: Analyse part geometry to identify part type.
partIdentification.partTypeConfirmed: Part type has been confirmed by the user.

print.print: The job will begin printing on a device.
print.printed: The print job has completed successfully.
print.printFailed:
The print job has failed.
Refer to the printer screen for more information.
print.printing: Print job is currently being printed.

statusTooltips.rejected: The part has been rejected by a user.

sendToPrinter.printJobDownloaded: Print job has been downloaded for manual editing in Composer.
sendToPrinter.sendingFailed:
The print job failed when sending to the printer.
This could be caused by printer connectivity issues.
sendToPrinter.sendToPrinter: Prepares and sends the job to a printer.
sendToPrinter.slicingFailed:
The print job has failed to whilst preparing the print layers.
This could be caused by issues with the part files.
sendToPrinter.slicingPrintJob: The print layers are being prepared.

tooltips.allParts: All parts that have been accepted are shown here, alongside their status.
tooltips.partsQueue: Parts that are queued for printing are shown here, grouped by their template.
